title: Keep Going Classes student portal: articles, admissions, and contact info

requirements.text: Create a responsive website/web app for the YouTube channel "Keep Going Classes" with the tagline presented in English and clear navigation for students.

quotes: I run a YouTube channel whose name is keep going classes and the tagline is it is a channel which is oriented to the for teaching academics to a student and for teaching the comp for competitive exams

acceptanceCriteria: The app header/site identity displays "Keep Going Classes" and an English tagline.
Navigation provides access to at least: Home, Articles, Admissions, Contact.
Layout is responsive and usable on mobile and desktop screen sizes.

requirements.text: Implement an Articles section where students can browse and read published articles.
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend provides an Articles listing page and an Article detail view.
Backend provides APIs to list articles and fetch an article by id.
Articles include at minimum: title, content body, created/published timestamp.
Articles display correctly after page refresh (data persists in canister stable storage).

requirements.text: Add an admin-only interface to create, edit, publish/unpublish, and delete articles using Internet Identity authentication.
acceptanceCriteria: There is an Admin area accessible only after logging in with Internet Identity.
Backend enforces admin authorization for all write operations (create/edit/publish/delete).
A configurable list of admin principals exists in the backend (hardcoded initial list is acceptable for initial build).
Non-admin users cannot access admin pages or perform admin operations (backend rejects unauthorized calls).

requirements.text: Implement an Admissions feature allowing students to submit admission/enrollment requests via a form.

quotes: I can open admissions on that website

acceptanceCriteria: Frontend includes an Admissions page with a form and submission success/failure feedback.
Backend stores admission submissions in stable storage.
A submission includes at minimum: student name, contact method (phone/email), selected course/interest area, message/notes, and submitted timestamp.
Admin-only view lists received admission submissions and allows marking them as reviewed/archived.

requirements.text: Add a Contact section/page that shows the creator's contact information and allows easy copying/launching (e.g., click-to-email, click-to-call when appropriate).
acceptanceCriteria: A Contact page exists and is reachable from navigation.
Contact details are presented in English with placeholders that are easy to update (phone, email, address and/or social links).
Email links use mailto: and phone uses tel: where applicable.

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for an educational/coaching brand and enforce it consistently across all pages.

quotes: make a app and make a website for me

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share consistent header/footer styling, typography scale, and color palette.
The theme does not rely on a default/unstyled look; it is clearly intentional and consistent.
Theme avoids a blue/purple-dominant palette unless explicitly needed for contrast/accessibility.

requirements.text: Provide a "mobile app-like" experience within the responsive web app (PWA-style basics): add installable metadata and a home-screen icon so students can save it to their device.

quotes: make a app and make a website for me so that I can open to all my students

acceptanceCriteria: App includes a web manifest and icons so modern browsers can offer an install option.
The app has a proper app title and icons when installed.
Core pages remain functional when accessed from an installed shortcut (no broken routing).

requirements.text: Add a simple Home page that explains what Keep Going Classes offers (academics + competitive exam preparation) and provides clear calls to action for Articles and Admissions.

quotes: oriented to the for teaching academics to a student and for teaching the comp for competitive exams

acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes an English description of the channel/academy focus.
Home page includes prominent links/buttons to Articles and Admissions.
Home page includes a brief section highlighting how to contact/join.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (single-canister backend).

Do not edit files under frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose these components instead).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Native iOS/Android app binaries (deliver a responsive web app with installable PWA-style behavior instead).

required: Educational brand logo mark with text "Keep Going Classes" (keep-going-classes-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide hero banner illustration with an academic/competitive exam study vibe (keep-going-classes-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
Simple set of 3 matching outline icons: Articles, Admissions, Contact (kgc-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)
